mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hospital VALUES ( #{id}, #{instit_nm}, #{instit_kind}, #{medical_instit_kind}, #{street_nm_addr}, #{organ_loc}, #{zip_code}, #{tel}, #{lng}, #{lat}, NOW(), NOW() )
